data.text: @bchadwickfrance Thanks Ben! Yes they closed M&S just before we moved in. To say there was wailing and gnashing of teeth would be an understatement.
@DrKevGuitar Hope you keep recovering.  Remember slowly slowly.  Recovery is a process not an event.
@DrKevGuitar I love it around there. There used to be a big M&S there too. And the nearby Île aux Cygnes is among my favourite places in the world. Hope you feel better soon.
@DrKevGuitar Sorry to hear…hope you’re back to 100% soon
